name: Fallin and Ballin
description: You take the role of a hamster who is put in unfortunate circumstances when they fall off of their mountain, deep into a mine. You must return to the top, following the signs as you traverse the mineshaft till you reach the surface. Will you get to the top, or will you accidentally press A one too many times and lose an hour of work? Controls: Use A and D (or arrow keys) to strafe. Hold space to increase elevation speed.
